concept.title: Troubleshooting
concept.shortdesc: The troubleshooting setting when enabled allows for logs to be maintained. This option is disabled by default. By enabling it, logs are saved from the application to track potential issues.

conbody.p: If you are experiencing a problem with the Sametime app, enable this setting and recreate the problem. See for instructions on how to report a problem and send logs to HCL.
